title: Back to school and Hitler's schemes for war
itunes:title: Back to school and Hitler's schemes for war
itunes:subtitle: Jane Hamlett talks about Victorian boarding schools and Joe Maiolo explains how Hitler hoped to win the Second World War with rockets and flying bombs.
description:
Jane Hamlett talks about Victorian boarding schools and Joe Maiolo explains how Hitler hoped to win the Second World War with rockets and flying bombs.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
